description: Skiva MediaFlow Composite Cable is AV/Video cable for iPhone/iPod/iPadThis cable will let you play video from your iPhone/iPad/iPhone to large screen TVIt connects to TV via composite RCA AV inputSkiva MediaFlow Composite is“Made for iPhone/iPad/iPod”certified for  following: 1. iPhone 4, 3GS, 3G 2. iPad,iPad2 (only video-out supported, no mirroring.)3. iPod Touch 4th Gen, 3rd Gen, 2nd Gen & 1st Gen. 4. iPod Nano 6th Gen, 5th Gen, 4th Gen & 3rd Gen 5. iPod ClassicAll firmwares including iOS 4.x and iOS 3.x are supported. MediaFlow Composite can charge iPad/iPod/iPhone while playing video.Features /b>Composite Video OutGet high quality video using composite cables for your HD TV, Car Display or Projector.Hi-Fi Audio OutputThis is a great feature for anyone who loves connecting iPhone/iPod/iPad to  speakers or audio systems. It lets you use high quality iPad/iPod/iPhone line  out audio instead of headphone jack.Charging & Sync SupportMediaFlow has integrated USB that let you charge or Sync iPhone while playing video.Made for iPhone/iPad/iPodSkiva mediaadapter cable has Apple’s “Made for iPhone/iPad/iPod” logo.Length5 feets / 1.5 metersOur AV products including this cable are tested and certified by Apple. Your satisfaction is guaranteed. We proud ourselves in our customer support. If you face any issue with this product's functionality please contact us and we will make sure that you are taken care of.
title: Skiva F101 MediaFlow Composite Video/AV Cable with USB Sync/Charge for iPhone 4S/4, iPad 3, iPad 2, iPhone, iPad and iPod
